Class UserService

com.masri.TaskMangamentSystem.service.UserService

@Service public class UserService extends Object implements ServiceInterface<User>
Service class for managing users.

      Specified by:

      Parameters:

      Returns:

      Parameters:

      email - The new email address.
      Throws:
